alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 1:38AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Johns, northeastern Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 137 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Switzerland, or over Fruit Cove, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, World Golf Village, Fleming Island, Nocatee, Durbin, Vilano Beach and Switzerland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
